formulas.raw: Simple payback \[ \text{Find } n \text{ s.t. } \sum_{t=1}^{n-1} CF_t \lt I_0 \le \sum_{t=1}^{n} CF_t,\quad \text{then } \mathrm{PBP} = (n-1) + \frac{I_0 - \sum_{t=1}^{n-1} CF_t}{CF_n} \] Discounted payback (rate \(r\)) \[ \text{DCF}_t = \frac{CF_t}{(1+r)^t},\quad \text{find } n \text{ s.t. } \sum_{t=1}^{n-1} \text{DCF}_t \lt I_0 \le \sum_{t=1}^{n} \text{DCF}_t,\quad \mathrm{DPBP} = (n-1) + \frac{I_0 - \sum_{t=1}^{n-1} \text{DCF}_t}{\text{DCF}_n} \]
